GreenZone Golf

Maintenance and Consulting for GreenZone Sports

I consult for and maintain this Appcelerator Titanium / Django application.

Amongst other things, I made performance improvements which sped up the API and web views by tenfold, and fixed some serious bugs in subscription lifecycle code as well as making some purely cosmetic changes.
